attributes.background: Why do we have to pay full price road tax, when are roads are in such a state?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636418

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require daily council tax discounts by councils that fail to maintain roads: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633626
